abstract: India's fastest track faces fanfare, farmer protests and tax questions.
snippet: India's fastest track faces fanfare, farmer protests and tax questions.
lead_paragraph: Will the Buddh International Circuit, India's first Formula One arena, be ready on Oct. 28, when teams descend on the venue for their first practice session? Even Bernie Ecclestone had his doubts until recently.

headline.main: F1 Races Into India, Controversy Follows
